mapper.sql: SUPPLIER_NO, ID, VALID, STATUS, ACCOUNT_NO, CAPITAL_ACCOUNT_NO, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, SORT
mapper.insert: insert into INS_SUPPLIER (SUPPLIER_NO, ID, VALID, STATUS, ACCOUNT_NO, CAPITAL_ACCOUNT_NO, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, SORT) values (#{supplierNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{capitalAccountNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update INS_SUPPLIER
ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACCOUNT_NO = #{accountNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CAPITAL_ACCOUNT_NO = #{capitalAccountNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where SUPPLIER_NO = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update INS_SUPPLIER set ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACCOUNT_NO = #{accountNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAPITAL_ACCOUNT_NO = #{capitalAccountNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT} where SUPPLIER_NO = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MAX(SORT) from INS_SUPPLIER where valid=1

select
from INS_SUPPLIER where SUPPLIER_NO = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND VALID=1
